# dropOffLocation

**Instance Property**

The destination of the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var dropOffLocation: CLPlacemark? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the final destination for the ride. Do not include the pickup location in the[doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideStatus/waypoints] property.

The default value of this property is `nil`.

## Accessing the Route Information

- **pickupLocation**: The starting location for the ride.
- **waypoints**: The intermediate waypoints for the journey.
